explanation: [0-0] The video starts with a view from above a wheelchair tennis match. Hewett, wearing a dark purple uniform, is in the near end of the shot, sitting in his wheelchair with his racket raised and a white tennis ball resting on top of it. He is wearing a white headband. At the far end of the court, Oda, wearing a white uniform and a white headband, sits in his wheelchair. The blue court, marked with white lines, has "MELBOURNE" printed on the surface. The far end shows audience seats and white icons on black billboards. On the lower-left of the frame is the match information.
[0-3] The video begins with Hewett serving the ball to Oda, who returns it. Hewett receives the returned ball at the baseline and hits it back.
